Module jGame
Package jGame.core.launcher

Class GameLauncher

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.launcher.GameLauncher
public class GameLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
This class is designed to be the entry-point for any game based on the JGame framework.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  GameLauncher.UIHudPauseMenuElement
    Represents the pause menu that appears when the user pauses the game.

    • setHudEvent

      public static void setHudEvent()
      Convenience method to indicate that any events generated by the user that are processed by any UIHudElements are not to be processed by any listener declared in this class.
      Since:
      1.2.0

      @Deprecated public static void unpause()

      Unpauses the game.

      Toggles the pause action.

      private static void render()
      Renders the game on the screen, by clearing the game window, rendering all entities and then the HUD.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • processGameTermination

      private static void processGameTermination()
      Processes game termination. This method is called when the game is about to close and we need to perform some vital last minute operations.
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • tick

      private static void tick()
      Updates all the entities in the game before rendering them.
      Since:
      1.0.0
